Name: Physical Trough Power Block Common

Caption.String: Parasitic losses typically reduce net output to approximately 90 % of design gross power
System availability losses reduce the system output to represent system outages or other events.

DP_SGS.Label: Pressure drop within the steam generator

PB_COPY_htf_cp_avg.Label: htf spec heat at avg temp

PB_m_dot_htf_cycle_des.Label: Cycle design HTF mass flow rate

gross_net_conversion_factor.Label: Estimated gross to net conversion factor

q_max_aux.Label: Max heat rate of auxiliary heater

q_pb_design.Label: Design heat input to power block

q_sby_frac.Label: Fraction of thermal power needed for standby

startup_frac.Label: Fraction of thermal power needed for startup

Equations: // Need common variable name for variables
// That user defined power cycle can reference
Callbacks: on_load{'Physical Trough Power Block Common'} = define()
